Hello Physics Enthusiasts

We are pleased to announce the upcoming third edition of the Model Solvay Conference, which will take place on March 13th-14th, 2021. Aspiring physicists are invited to participate in this prestigious event, where they can showcase their knowledge, critical thinking skills, and creativity, and compete with other young physics enthusiasts from around the world.

The Model Solvay Conference comprises two rounds: Prelims and Finals. Participants must submit their solutions to a challenging problem, and the qualified teams will have the opportunity to present and defend their solutions against a panel of experts and their peers in the Finals.

This event provides a unique opportunity for aspiring physicists to push the boundaries of their understanding of physics, explore new ideas, and collaborate with others. The Model Solvay Conference is part of a legendary tradition that has brought together Nobel laureates and other distinguished figures in physics.

We invite all aspiring physicists to join us for the Model Solvay Conference and be part of this inspiring and educational event.
